jacksCarRental
Class CarRental

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractEnvironmentSingle
      jacksCarRental.CarRental
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnvironment, IEnvironmentSingle, java.io.Serializable, ValueIteration
public class CarRental
extends AbstractEnvironmentSingle
implements ValueIteration

Here are defined the settings of the problem : probabilities, rewards... The code for Value Iteration is copied/adapted from Sutton & Barto code

See Also:
